title: Glasgow
name: Willow Tea Rooms
hours: Mon-Sat 9:00-17:30, Sun 10:30-17:30 (last orders 1 hour before closing time)
content: During the temperance movement, the idea of "tearooms", places where you could relax and enjoy non-alcoholic refreshments in differently themed rooms, became popular in Glasgow. This one, designed by Charles Rennie Mackintosh in 1904, was the most popular of its time and has been lovingly restored.
